PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13432019-11-20PMO,  ,  ,  , 
ActSalaries Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Department of (1) Canadian Heritage; (2) Industry to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages
PrecisOrder (1) designating the DEPARTMENT OF CANADIAN HERITAGE to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities relating to official languages; and (2) designating the DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages in the carrying out of all of the other responsibilities of that Minister.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2019-0105 Publication Date: 2019-12-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Designating the Department of (1) Canadian Heritage; (2) Industry to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages
precis: Order (1) designating the DEPARTMENT OF CANADIAN HERITAGE to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages in the carrying out of that Minister's responsibilities relating to official languages; and (2) designating the DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY to provide support to the Minister of Economic Development and Official Languages in the carrying out of all of the other responsibilities of that Minister.
